newsitem.title: ALBANIA: Europe and CIS port conditions - Lloyds.
newsitem.headline: Europe and CIS port conditions - Lloyds.

text.p: Port conditions from Lloyds Shipping Intelligence Service --

ALBANIA - Durres - May 19 - four vessels in port, all discharging, of which 2 cement, 1 general cargo, 1 nitrates, 5 vessels waiting in roads, all to discharge, of which 1 wheat, 1 kerosene, 1 nitrates, 1 potatoes, 1 machinery.

BULGARIA, May 12-18 - Bourgas - twenty-five vessels in port operating of which 17 loading (1 metal, 2 fertiliser, 2 general cargo, 2 timber, 1 bentonite, 1 clinker, 4 steel, 1 benzene, 1 gasoil, 2 chemicals, 5 discharging (1 iron ore, 1 spirit, 1 rails, 1 wheat, 1 sugar), 1 discharging/loading pipes/metal, 1 after repairs, 1 cargo not nominated, 9 vessels waiting in roads of which 6 to load (2 tankers, 2 steel, 1 chemicals, 1 other vessel), 1 to discharge copper concentrates, 2 empty, 20 vessels due of which 15 to load (4 fertiliser, 3 steels, 1 baryte concentrates, 1 general cargo, 1 cars, 1 bentonite, 1 tobacco, 1 zinc, 1 metals, 1 other vessel), 4 to discharge (1 benzene, 1 tobac, 2 coal), 1 to discharge/load containers.

Varna - Varna East, Varna West, Balchik - 44 vessels in port operating of which 27 loading (4 cement, 1 plywood, 1 scrap, 4 urea, 3 clinker, 7 soda, 3 quartz sand, 1 sulphuric acid, 1 SAS, 1 TSP, 1 frozen chicken), 5 discharging (2 phosphorite, 1 wheat, 1 coal, 1 flour), 1 discharging/loading rice/lentils/soda, 8 discharging/loading containers, 3 discharging/loading trucks/containers, 7 vessels waiting in roads of which 3 to load (1 soda, 1 clinker, 1 other vessel), 1 to discharge/load containers, 3 cargo not nominated.

May 19 - Bourgas - no labour problems. Bourgas East - 9 vessels loading at berth, 2 discharging at berth, 11 vessels waiting at anchorage to load, 1 waiting to discharge, 4 vessels under repairs/dry-docked, 20 vessels due. Bourgas West - 4 vessels loading at berth, 2 discharging at berth. Tanker Port - 3 vessels loading at berth.

Varna - no labour problems. Varna East - 2 vessels loading at berth, 4 discharging at berth, 1 vessel waiting at anchorage to load, 1 waiting to discharge. Varna West - 9 vessels loading at berth, 2 discharging at berth, Varna Lesport/Tanker Port - no vessels.
CROATIA, May 19 - Pula - one vessel discharging at berth, 1 under repairs/dry-docked.
Rasa - one vessel loading at berth.
Rijeka - two vessels discharging at berth, 3 loading at berth, 11 vessels under repairs/dry-docked, 8 vessels due with delays expected.
Zadar - two vessels under repairs/dry-docked.
Sibenik - one vessel under repairs/dry-docked.
Split - three vessels discharging at berth, 1 loading at berth, 3 vessels under repairs/dry-docked.
Ploce - one vessel loading at berth, 1 discharging at berth.
Dubrovnik - no vessels.
ESTONIA, May 19 - no labour problems. Tallinn - City Port - 2 vessels loading berth (1 map, 1 pig-iron), 1 vessel under repairs/dry-docked, 1 awaiting orders, 3 vessels due.
Kopli - 3 vessels loading at berth (1 non-ferrous metals, 2 sawn timber), 1 discharging fish at berth, 7 vessels due.
Muuga - 6 vessels loading at berth (1 peat, 1 fertiliser, 1 grain, 1 general cargo, 2 fuel oil), 5 discharging at berth (2 grain, 2 equipment, 1 general cargo), 4 vessels due.
Parnu - nine vessels loading at berth (2 peat, 4 timber, 1 briquettes, 1 boards, 1 building materials), 1 discharging road metal at berth, 5 vessels due.
ITALY, May 20 - Naples - one gas tanker ETB 20/5, 1 bulk carrier ETB over the next few days.
Gaeta, Salerno - no vessels in roads.
Genoa Commercial Port - no vessels in roads, no delays. 22 vessels berthed, 4 in drydock.
Multedo oil harbour - no vessels in roads, no delays, 2 vessels berthed.
Savona - one vessel in roads, 4 berthed.
Vado Ligure - no vessels in roads, no delays, 2 vessels berthed.
La Spezia - no vessels in roads, no delays, 8 vessels berthed, 4 under repair/drydock.
Leghorn - eight vessels in roads, no delays, 38 vessels berthed.
Civitavecchia, Gaeta, Naples, Salerno, Palermo - no vessels in roads, no delays.
Syracuse Oil Harbour, Augusta Oil Harbour, Sarroch, Ancona/Falconara, Venice - no delays.
Taranto - two vessels in roads.
Ravenna - four vessels in roads.
Trieste - two vessels in roads, some delays at Siot oil terminal.

LATVIA, May 21 - Riga - twelve vessels operating of which 4 timber loaders, 1 cotton loader, 2 container loaders, 1 tanker loader, 1 steel loader, 3 frozen foods dischargers, 3 vessels awaiting operations, no delays, 16 vessels due.
Ventspils - five vessels operating of which 3 steel loaders, 1 MOP loader, 1 miscellaneous, no delays, 1 awaiting operations at outer port, 10 vessels due.
Liepaja - nine vessels operating, no delays, 2 vessels due.

LITHUANIA, May 19 - Klaipeda - seven vessels in port loading (1 cement, 1 fertiliser, 3 metal, 1 containers, 1 scrap), 2 discharging (1 fish, 1 grain), 1 loading/discharging, 2 vessels in roads, 25 vessels due.
POLAND, May 20 - Szczecin - forty-two vessels loading at berth, 32 discharging at berth, 10 vessels under repairs/dry-docked, 79 vessels due with delays expected.

Gdynia - three vessels loading at berth (2 general cargo, 1 bulker), 4 discharging at berth (1 general cargo, 1 tanker, 2 grain), 2 vessels waiting at anchorage to discharge, 11 vessels under repairs/dry-docked, 30 vessels due.

Gdansk - seven vessels loading at berth (2 bulkers, 3 general car, 1 coal), 3 discharging at berth (1 tanker, 1 grain, 1 bulker), 8 vessels under repairs/dry-docked, 2 vessels waiting in roads, 16 vessels due.
PORTUGAL, May 19 - Leixoes - fifteen vessels operating of which 12 general cargo, 3 containers, no vessels waiting. Vacant places - 2 piers without cranes.

Lisbon - seventy-four vessels in port - 5 loading at berth, 16 discharging at berth, 2 loading/discharging at berth, 3 loading at anchorage, 1 bunkering, 13 under repairs/drydock, 4 awaiting orders, 24 other craft, 56 vessels due.

Sines - five vessels in port operating of which 3 discharging (1 crude oil, 1 coal, 1 chemical naphtha), 2 loading (1 propylene, 1 gasoil/gasoline/jet fuel), 1 vessel waiting to load unleaded gasoline, 6 vessels due of which 5 to load (1 propylene, 1 fuel oil, 1 solid sulphur, 1 bane), 1 to discharge metallic structures.
Setubal, May 20 - four vessels loading at berth, 5 discharging at berth, 5 under repairs/drydock. Vessels due - 5 for discharging, 3 for loading, 1 for repairs.

ROMANIA, May 19 - Constantza - thirty-six vessels operating of which 17 general cargo (15 loading, 2 discharging), 7 bulkers (5 loading, 2 discharging), 2 tankers (both discharging), 2 containers (1 loading, 1 discharging), 6 bagged chemicals, 2 cement (all loading), 7 vessels waiting in roads of which 3 general cargo, 1 bagged chemicals (all to load), 3 bulkers (2 to load, 1 to discharge).
Constantza South (Agigea) - eight vessels operating of which 7 general cargo (6 loading, 1 discharging), 1 bulker discharging.
Mangalia - two vessels in port.
Midia - three livestock carriers loading.

RUSSIA, Baltic Ports, May 19 - Petersburg - ten vessels in port operating of which 6 loading (3 non-ferrous metals, 1 scrap, 2 fertiliser), 4 discharging (1 frozen meat, 1 containers, 2 frozen chicken), 5 vessels waiting, 16 vessels due.
Kaliningrad - seven vessels in port operating of which 5 loading (1 fertiliser, 2 steel scrap, 1 coke, 1 coal), 1 discharging/loading trailers, 1 discharging gravel, 7 vessels due.
May 21 - Vyborg - four vessels in port operating, no delays, 7 vessels due.
Kaliningrad - eleven vessels operating, no delays, 4 vessels due.
Far Eastern Ports, May 20 - no delays/strikes/congestion.
Vladivostok - eleven vessels in port of which 5 loading (1 containers, 1 timber, 2 metal, 1 general cargo), 2 passenger vessels, 4 vessels waiting.
Nakhodka - fourteen vessels in port of which 9 loading (4 metal, 1 general cargo, 4 timber), 5 waiting.
Vostochny - ten vessels in port ofhich 6 loading (2 timber, 2 coal, 1 metal, 1 clinker), 2 loading/discharging containers, 2 waiting.
Posyet - one timber vessel loading.
Zarubino - no vessels in port.

Black Sea, May 19 - Novorossiysk - twenty vessels in port operating of which 11 loading (1 cement, 1 scrap, 1 copper cathodes, 1 urea, 5 steel, 1 non-ferrous metals, 1 paper/copper), 9 discharging (2 rice, 1 steel, 1 cement concentrate, 3 sugar, 2 various), 21 vessels waiting in roads of which 13 to load (6 steel, 2 copper cathodes, 1 cellulose, 1 paper, 1 tin, 1 coal, 1 scrap), 8 to discharge (3 sugar, 3 rice, 2 citrus), 34 vessels due of which 22 to load (1 cement, 1 coal, 1 urea, 3 scrap, 9 steel, 2 copper, 1 aluminium, 2 fertiliser, 1 paper, 1 seeds), 12 to discharge (4 sugar, 1 rice, 1 bananas, 2 citrus, 1 sand, 1 styrene, 2 luggage).
Oil Terminal, May 20 - 1 tanker berthed to load crude oil, 1 tanker waiting in roads to load crude oil, 9 tankers due to load of which 3 fuel oil, 1 diesel oil, 1 crude oil.

Northern Basin, May 20 - Murmansk - six vessels operating of which 2 alumina, 1 steel, 1 apatite, 1 non-ferrous metals, 1 general cargo, 2 apatite loaders awaiting berths, 7 vessels due during the week of which 5 loaders (1 non-ferrous metals, 1 steel, 2 apatite, 1 iron ore pellets), 2 alumina dischargers.
